languages.text: При прохождении чека мы видим, что данные о закупках не совпадают, намекая на коррупцию (или ошибку)

traits.locale_text: При прохождении чека мы видим, что данные о закупках не совпадают, намекая на коррупцию (или ошибку)

languages.text: Финансовые отчеты. Данные о закупках не сходятся с данными о расходах, но изящно прикрываются графой "усадка".
Financial reports. The procurement data does not match up with the spending, but this has been gracefully covered up by way of a "shrinkage" column.
languages.original_text: Финансовые отчеты. Данные о закупках не сходятся с данными о расходах, но изящно прикрываются графой "усадка".

traits.locale_text: Financial reports. The procurement data does not agree with the spending, but is gracefully covered up by a "shrinkage" column.
Financial reports. The procurement data does not match up with the spending, but this has been gracefully covered up by way of a "shrinkage" column.

Financial reports. The procurement data does not match up with the spending, but this has been gracefully covered up by way of a "shrinkage" column.

languages.text: Finanzberichte. Die Auftragsdaten decken sich nicht mit den Ausgaben, aber dies wird durch die Spalte "Schwund" elegant erklärt.
languages.original_text: Financial reports. The procurement data does not match up with the spending, but this has been gracefully covered up by way of a "shrinkage" column.

traits.locale_text: Finanzberichte. Die Auftragsdaten decken sich nicht mit den Ausgaben, aber dies wird durch die Spalte "Schwund" elegant erklärt.

languages.text: Des rapports financiers. Les données d'acquisition ne correspondent pas aux dépenses, mais une colonne intitulée « pertes » a été ajoutée pour compenser la différence.
languages.original_text: Financial reports. The procurement data does not match up with the spending, but this has been gracefully covered up by way of a "shrinkage" column.

traits.locale_text: Des rapports financiers. Les données d'acquisition ne correspondent pas aux dépenses, mais une colonne intitulée « pertes » a été ajoutée pour compenser la différence.

languages.text: 这些财务报告的采购数据与实际支出并不相符，但有人在“折旧率”这一栏上做了手脚，将这一点巧妙地掩饰起来。
languages.original_text: Financial reports. The procurement data does not match up with the spending, but this has been gracefully covered up by way of a "shrinkage" column.

traits.locale_text: 这些财务报告的采购数据与实际支出并不相符，但有人在“折旧率”这一栏上做了手脚，将这一点巧妙地掩饰起来。

languages.text: Informes financieros. Los datos de recaudación no coinciden con los gastos, pero hay una elegante tapadera: una columna de «contracción».
languages.original_text: Financial reports. The procurement data does not match up with the spending, but this has been gracefully covered up by way of a "shrinkage" column.

traits.locale_text: Informes financieros. Los datos de recaudación no coinciden con los gastos, pero hay una elegante tapadera: una columna de «contracción».

languages.text: 財務報告書。調達データと支出が一致していないが、「減損」欄で巧みにごまかされている。
languages.original_text: Financial reports. The procurement data does not match up with the spending, but this has been gracefully covered up by way of a "shrinkage" column.

traits.locale_text: 財務報告書。調達データと支出が一致していないが、「減損」欄で巧みにごまかされている。

languages.text: Mali raporlar. Tedarik verileri, harcama kalemleriyle örtüşmüyor. Ancak bu tutarsızlık, "küçülme" adlı bir sütunda itinayla gizlenmiş.
languages.original_text: Financial reports. The procurement data does not match up with the spending, but this has been gracefully covered up by way of a "shrinkage" column.

traits.locale_text: Mali raporlar. Tedarik verileri harcama kalemleriyle örtüşmüyor fakat bu tutarsızlık "küçülme" adlı bir sütunda itinayla gizlenmiş.
